casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Shannon Denise HAISLIP. No. 513P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 19, 2007. Leslie Robinson, Greenville, for Haislip. Clark Everett, District Attorney, for State.

Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 651 S.E.2d 243.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th day of October 2007 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 19th day of October 2007."
